LanguageData.CommandLaunchShipDesc: Initiate Launch Sequence and choose the target.
LanguageData.CommandLaunchFleetDesc: Launch the fleet this ship is assigned to.
LanguageData.CommandLoadShipCargoDesc: Load Cargo and passengers into the ship
LanguageData.MessageShipCargoLoadStarted: Your colonists will now load the assigned cargo into {0} (ship)
LanguageData.MessageShipsArrived: Your ships have arrived at their destination.
LanguageData.MessageFleetLaunchImpossible: Cannot launch as fleet. At least one ship doesn't have enough fuel to reach the target.
LanguageData.CommandShipTouchdownDesc: Temporarily land all aircraft for further planning.
LanguageData.CommandLaunchFleetFailDueToNotReady: At least one ship in the fleet isn't ready to launch.
